input.describe-image: Describe the image you want to create...

title.zoom-in: Zoom in on the face in the image
title.expand: Expand to show more of the scene
title.swap-faces: Swap faces between the two images
title.try-on: Try on clothes from the second image on the person in the first image
title.product-ad: Create an image of a person holding/presenting a product
title.accessories: Create an image of a person holding/presenting a product
title.product-shot: Place the product in a specific location
title.interior-design: Change the interior design of a room
title.age-variation: Change the age of the person in the image
title.change-background: Change the background of the image
title.job: Change the profession of the person in the photo
title.custom: Enter your own prompt to edit the image. The second image is optional

no-image-history: No images in history yet. Let's process some images first!
confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this image?
confirm-clear: Are you sure you want to clear all images?
prompt-placeholder: Enter the editing prompt you want. For example: Change the girl's face to Anne Hathaway.
